column4: guys.. i have problems with mounting a cd rw.. I keep getting the error.. sam@ubuntu:/mnt$ sudo mount /dev/hdc /media/cdrom0 mount: block device /dev/hdc is write-protected, mounting read-only
that is not an error message
its my cdrw and I want to be able rw to it can somone help
you can, just go use it, that is a normal message. U dont need it mounted to burn
